enGB: You may use your {g}Strength{/g} modifier in place of your {g}Dexterity{/g} modifier for your attack rolls when making a ranged attack with thrown weapons. You may also use the Power Attack feat instead of the Deadly Aim feat when attacking with thrown weapons.

{g|Encyclopedia:Size}Size{/g}: Large
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}: 50 ft.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}: +4 natural armor
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 hooves (1d6)
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 16, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 6
Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}
At 4th level, a horse gains Str +2 and Con +2 and its hoof attacks become primary.
When riding a horse, you gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC and on attack rolls against enemies of Medium size or smaller.

Reddit's own character class. CHA TO EVERYTHING! 
Basically Fighter class with +CHA to all stats and CHA spellcasting. (This is a meme class I made, don't take it too seriously)'
Reddit's own character class. CHA TO EVERYTHING!
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}.

The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:SaveFortitude}Fortitude{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SaveReflex}Reflex{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SaveWill}Will{/g} saves.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his skills.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his damage.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:BaseAttackBonus}Base Attack Bonus{/g}.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his Critical bonus.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his Spell Resistance.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his Damage Reduction. (CURRENTLY BROKEN).
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his Spell Penetration.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his spell's DC.
The Redditor adds his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}, again!.
Swordmasters are proficient with all simpe and martial swords, plut the quarterstaff. They are proficient with light armor, but not with shields.
You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that each deal 2d8 damage
